item.title: Meaningfully reducing meat consumption is an unsolved problem: meta-analysis
Sexual violence prevention programs change ideas, not behaviors
item.description: I am a co-author on a new meta-analysis: Preventing Sexual Violence —A Behavioral Problem Without a Behaviorally-Informed Solution, along with Roni Porat, Ana P. Gantman, John-Henry Pezzuto, and Elizabeth Levy Paluck. The vast majority of papers try to change ideas about sexual violence and are moderately successful at that. However, on the most crucial outcomes — perpetration and victimization — the primary prevention literature has not yet found its footing.
